prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with a strong build and a playful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a small horse with earthy colors and a friendly expression.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, characterized by its sturdy legs and playful nature.
Imagine a Pokemon with a brown coat and distinctive white spots, perfect for rough terrains.
Design a cute quadruped Pokemon that loves to explore mountains and fields.
Give me an adorable Pokemon with a strong connection to the earth, showcasing its playful spirit.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a hardworking creature, strong and reliable.
